Term.Gloss: (qal) perish, to be killed; (pi) destroy; (hi) destroy, exterminate
(qal) mourn; (hi) cause to mourn; (htp) mourn; (qal) dry up
(qal) be red; (pu) be made red; (hi) be red; (htp) look reddish
(qal) love; (ni) be lovable; (pi) be friend, lover
(hi) be bright; (qal) pitch a tent; (pi) pitch a tent
water bag; spirit of the dead; necromancy
(qal) be, become light; (ni) be, become light; (hi) shine; light up
(qal) put on, gird; (ni) be girded (with); (pi) gird someone; (htp) gird oneself
(qal) seize; (ni) be seized, held; (ho) be seized; (qal) cover; (pi) cover
(qal) stay behind; (pi) stay behind; detain, hold back; hesitate; (hi) be late
coast, island; howler, jackal?; where; how (= not)
ram; leader of a nation; mighty tree; pillar
